title: table "oc_clndr_repeat" that does not exist)
body:
i updated my owncloud to 5.0.9 without any problems.
after the upgrade i installed the calender app from the app list. the installation was not successful.
i logged off and i cannot logon again. the message is: failed to upgrade "calendar". exception="failed to update database structure (mdb2_schema error: invalid, it was specified a previous table name ("oc_calendar_repeat") for table "oc_clndr_repeat" that does not exist)"

my table list in mysql is:
+--------------------------+
| tables_in_jdvcloud       |
+--------------------------+
| oc_appconfig             |
| oc_authtoken             |
| oc_bookmarks             |
| oc_bookmarks_tags        |
| oc_clndr_calendars       |
| oc_clndr_objects         |
| oc_contacts_addressbooks |
| oc_contacts_cards        |
| oc_foldersize            |
| oc_gallery_albums        |
| oc_gallery_photos        |
| oc_group_user            |
| oc_groups                |
| oc_locks                 |
| oc_log                   |
| oc_media_albums          |
| oc_media_artists         |
| oc_media_sessions        |
| oc_media_songs           |
| oc_media_users           |
| oc_preferences           |
| oc_principalgroups       |
| oc_principals            |
| oc_properties            |
| oc_sharing               |
| oc_users                 |
+--------------------------+

i renamed the tabels by using this commands
mysql> rename table oc_calendar_calendars to oc_clndr_calendars;
mysql> rename table oc_calendar_objects to oc_clndr_objects;

i see the tables oc_clndr_repeat, oc_clndr_share_calendar and oc_clndr_share_event are not created.
how do i create these tables in mysql?
